headline: Costco quietly added a major credit card perk
summary: Almost two-thirds of Americans feel the current economy isn't working for them.Customers with Costco credit cards just got a new benefit that can help ease financial strain.Costco offers cardholders a generous cash-back perk on a popular product. headline: Bessent says US Treasury can easily cover any tariff refunds
summary: Bessent said in an interview that he still doubted that the court would rule against Trump's tariffs, but he believed that any refunds would be a corporate boondoggle for companies that passed on added costs to their customers.
